scripts.build:web:dev: npm run clean && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev webpack --config build/webpack.dev.js
scripts.build:web:test: npm run clean && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test webpack --config build/webpack.dev.js
scripts.build:web:prod: npm run clean && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prod webpack --config build/webpack.prod.js
scripts.main:dev: npm run clean:main && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev webpack --config build/webpack.electron.js
scripts.main:test: npm run clean:main && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test webpack --config build/webpack.electron.js
scripts.main:prod: npm run clean:main && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prod webpack --config build/webpack.electron.js
scripts.client:dev: npm run main:dev && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev HOT=true electron app/main.js
scripts.client:test: npm run main:test && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test HOT=true electron app/main.js
scripts.client:prod: npm run main:prod && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prod HOT=true electron app/main.js
scripts.build:client:dev: npm run clean:output && npm run build:web:dev && npm run main:test && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev electron-builder -mw
scripts.build:client:test: npm run clean:output && npm run build:web:test && npm run main:test && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test electron-builder -mw
scripts.build:client:prod: npm run clean:output && npm run build:web:prod && npm run main:prod && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prod electron-builder -mw
